get.summary: Gets a paginated list of attack surface assets.

parameters.name: Offset
parameters.description: The zero based offset for pagination, defaults to 0.

parameters.name: Limit
parameters.description: The limit of results per call, between 1-1,000, defaults to 100.

get.summary: Generates a CSV export of all attack surface assets.

200.description: Success.  A string representing a temporary URL where the CSV export can be downloaded.

get.summary: Gets a paginated list of attack surface remediations.

parameters.name: StartDateRemediated
parameters.description: A start date filter in ISO 8601 format (e.g., 2024-07-23), defaults to 90 days ago.

parameters.name: EndDateRemediated
parameters.description: An end date filter in ISO 8601 format (e.g., 2024-10-21), defaults to today.

parameters.name: Offset
parameters.description: The zero based offset for pagination, defaults to 0.

parameters.name: Limit
parameters.description: The limit of results per call, between 1-1,000, defaults to 100.

get.summary: Generates a CSV export of all attack surface remediations.

200.description: Success.  A string representing a temporary URL where the CSV export can be downloaded.

parameters.name: Offset
parameters.description: The zero based offset for pagination, defaults to 0.

parameters.name: Limit
parameters.description: The limit of results per call, between 1-1,000, defaults to 100.

get.summary: Generates a CSV export of all attack surface vulnerabilities.

200.description: Success.  A string representing a temporary URL where the CSV export can be downloaded.

get.summary: Retrieves the deployment command for the internal network module, agent-based deployment for Windows.
get.description: This will be a PowerShell command that needs to be run as an administrator on the target machine.

get.summary: Retrieves the deployment command for the internal network module, network-based deployment for Linux APT.
get.description: This will be a shell command that needs to be run as an administrator on the target machine.

get.summary: Retrieves the deployment command for the internal network module, network-based deployment for Linux RPM.
get.description: This will be a shell command that needs to be run as an administrator on the target machine.

get.summary: Retrieves the deployment command for the identity security module for Windows.
get.description:
This will be a PowerShell command that needs to be run as an administrator on the target machine.
The target machine must be joined to the Active Directory domain.

post.summary: Generates reports based on the request parameters.

200.description: Success.  A list of report metadata representing the generated reports.

get.summary: Generates a temporary download link for the specified report path.
Retrieves a list of previously generated reports.
Retrieves the authenticated subscription.
Retrieves all subscriptions accessible to the authenticated API key.

patch.summary: Updates an existing subscription with a regenerated agent registration key.
Updates an existing subscription with a regenerated API key.

x-subscription-id.description: A subscription id which can be found on the account page
x-subscription-id.name: x-subscription-id

x-api-key.description: An api key linked to a subscription which can be found on the account page
x-api-key.name: x-api-key

Bearer.description: A JWT Bearer token which can be found in the headers of an authorized request
